source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000010_LYSE<tab>Come to see how we're getting on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000010_LYSE<tab>Tu es venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> voir comment vont les choses ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000020_LYSE<tab>We've made good progress since we took back Ala Mhigo, but there's one big issue we still have to address...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000020_LYSE<tab>Depuis que nous avons été libérés du joug de l'Empire, nous avons commencé à prendre les mesures nécessaires pour rebâtir le pays. Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, nous faisons face à de nombreuses difficultés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000030_LYSE<tab>Leadership. The Domans had Lord Hien ready and willing to take the throne, but we've got no one like that here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000030_LYSE<tab>Con<var 16 /var>trai<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment à Doma, Ala Mhigo n'a pas de souverain tout désigné prêt à prendre les rênes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000040_LYSE<tab>Theodoric was our last ruler─and he wasn't called the mad king for nothing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000040_LYSE<tab>Nous avions une monarchie avant l'invasion garlemaldaise, mais le dernier roi était un tyran qui persécutait son peuple...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000041_LYSE<tab>[EXHAUSTED SIGH]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000041_LYSE<tab>(soupire)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000050_MNAAGO<tab>Suffice it to say, our people have had their fill of kings─which means we need to find a new way forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000050_MNAAGO<tab>Pour cette raison, trrrès peu de gens souhaitent revenir à la royauté. Il faut donc réfléchir à un nouveau régime.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000060_LYSE<tab>If only it were that easy. Everyone and his uncle has an opinion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000060_LYSE<tab>Oui... Mais bien évidemment, il y a de nombreux avis divergents quant à ce qui conviendrait le mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000070_LYSE<tab>For the time being, we're just going to have to keep leaning on General Aldynn and the Alliance for support, and see if we can't find a solution together. Something tells me we're going to be hosting a lot of meetings in the near future...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000070_LYSE<tab>Pour le moment, nous allons poursuivre les négociations à ce sujet avec le soutien de l'Alliance éorzéenne. D'ailleurs, une nouvelle réunion de con<var 16 /var>sul<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion doit avoir lieu aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000080_LYSE<tab>But if that's what it takes, I'm ready to talk till my jaw aches!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000080_LYSE<tab>Il y a du pain sur la planche, en somme<var 1D /var>! C'est l'avenir d'Ala Mhigo qui est en jeu, pas question de faire les choses à moitié<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000090_LYSE<tab>The Reach is yours, Naago. Don't do anything I wouldn't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000090_LYSE<tab>Bon, il est temps que j'y aille. M'naago, je te charge de monter la garde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000100_MNAAGO<tab>Aye, aye, Commander!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000100_MNAAGO<tab>Compte surrr moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000110_ARENVALD<tab>Ah, there you are! I've been searching all over for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000110_ARENVALD<tab>Ah, vous êtes là<var 1D /var>! Je vous cherchais, justement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000120_ARENVALD<tab>Don't worry, it's nothing bad. That said, this might not be the best place to talk. Will you join me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000120_ARENVALD<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, ce dont je veux vous parler n'a rien d'une corvée. Mais si vous n'y voyez pas d'in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>vé<var 16 /var>nient, j'aimerais en discuter autre part. Vous êtes d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000130_ARENVALD<tab>I'll get to the point: might you be interested in a spot of adventure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000130_ARENVALD<tab>Alors voilà, j'aurais besoin de votre aide pour une chasse au trésor.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000140_ARENVALD<tab>After all, we were “adventurers” before we were Scions, were we not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000140_ARENVALD<tab>Même si nous œuvrons au sein des Héritiers de la Septième Aube, vous et moi, nous sommes des aventuriers avant tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000150_ARENVALD<tab>After routing the imperials and liberating Ala Mhigo, I reckon we've earned a bit of respite, don't you? And what better way to spend it than by returning to our roots?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000150_ARENVALD<tab>Maintenant que l'Empire a été vaincu et que la libération d'Ala Mhigo est devenue réalité, je pense qu'il n'y a aucun mal à chercher de nouveaux défis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000160_ARENVALD<tab>So what say you: shall we call on Alphinaud and go adventuring?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000160_ARENVALD<tab>Il se trouve que j'ai justement déniché une information qui vaut de l'or. Alphinaud ne refusera pas. Avec vous, nous serons donc trois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous à Arenvald<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Twist my arm, why don't you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je suis toujours partant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour ce genre d'aventure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's what we do, I suppose...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je ne sais pas trop à quoi m'attendre, mais d'accord...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000170_ARENVALD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000170_ARENVALD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000190_ARENVALD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000190_ARENVALD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould appear this place is yet inhabited by King Theodoric's kin─or what is left of them. The work of terrible magicks, I fear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hmm... Tout semble indiquer que ces abo<var 16 /var>mi<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>tions sont des membres de la noblesse mhigoise, auxquels Theodoric a infligé de terribles traitements.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000230_ARENVALD<tab>Terrible, aye, but their misfortune is our...fortune?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000230_ARENVALD<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, admirez donc ce trésor. Il vaut bien la peine que nous nous sommes donnée, vous ne trouvez pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quite... By the Twelve, there is even more than I imagined...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je suis bien d'accord. Qui aurait cru qu'autant de richesses sommeillaient ici<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000250_ARENVALD<tab>Oh, I can't wait to see the look on Lyse's face! Thanks for believing in me, you two!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000250_ARENVALD<tab>Une chose est sûre, nous ne rentrerons pas les mains vides<var 1D /var>! Lyse et les autres se réjouiront sûrement en apprenant la nouvelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000260_MNAAGO<tab>Step back, all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000260_MNAAGO<tab>Je vous en prrrie<var 1D /var>! Essayez de garder votre calme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000270_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Like hells we will! We know who you've got in there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000270_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Et puis quoi encore<var 1D /var>!? On sait très bien qu'elle est retenue ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000280_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>We're not leaving till you hand her over!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000280_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>On va exposer cette sale traîtresse à la vue de tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000290_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Bring her out! Bring her out!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000290_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Ouais<var 1D /var>! Amenez-la-nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000300_LYSE<tab>What's going on!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000300_LYSE<tab>Mais qu'est-ce qui se passe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000310_MNAAGO<tab>Someone let slip about Fordola...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000310_MNAAGO<tab>J'ignore comment le brrruit s'est répandu, mais ces gens savent que Fordola est emprisonnée ici et ils réclament qu'elle leur soit livrée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000320_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>It's true then! The bitch really is in there! I knew it! I bloody knew it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000320_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>C'était donc vrai<var 1D /var>! L'Exécutrice est vraiment là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000330_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>We demand vengeance! Bring her out! Today we butcher the Butcher!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000330_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Pourquoi vous la protégez<var 1D /var>? Remettez-nous cette charogne<var 1D /var>! On va lui infliger le sort qu'elle mérite et l'écarteler vivante<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000340_LYSE<tab>Butcher the...? Come on, you don't mean that. We'd be no better than the imperials! If you'd all just calm down─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000340_LYSE<tab>L'écarteler<var 1D /var>!? En faisant ça, vous vous abaisseriez au niveau des Impériaux<var 1D /var>! Reprenez vos esprits, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000350_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>Calm down!? That monster and her thrice-damned Skulls dragged my man from our home and beat him to death in the street!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000350_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>C'est hors de question<var 1D /var>! Les Crânes ont assassiné mon fiancé<var 1D /var>! Elle doit payer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000360_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Aye! And my dad! That bitch has spilt enough blood to fill a loch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000360_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Moi, c'est mon père qu'ils ont tué<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000370_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>We all know her crimes! She's a traitor and a murderer! How many of your Resistance friends have died at her hands, eh? And here you are protecting her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000370_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Vous avez oublié que cette traîtresse et ses hommes ont massacré un grand nombre de vos camarades<var 1D /var>!? Elle mérite pas de vivre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000380_RAUBAHN<tab>So that's what all the fuss is about...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000380_RAUBAHN<tab>(-???-)Voilà donc la source de toute cette agitation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000390_RAUBAHN<tab>Hearken to me, brothers and sisters of Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000390_RAUBAHN<tab>Mes amis, écoutez-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000400_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Eh? Who's this...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000400_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Mais c'est qui çui-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000410_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>That's...that's the Bull of Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000410_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>C'est Raubahn... Le taureau d'Ala Mhigo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>My friends─you are not alone in your anger, your grief, your despair, for it is mine as well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>Je comprends votre peine et votre colère<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Parce que moi aussi, je ressens la même chose<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>That gnawing pain in your breast...it is enough to bring an old bull to his knees.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ces sentiments sont si forts qu'ils sont comme une douleur, qui menace de nous déchirer de l'intérieur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000440_RAUBAHN<tab>But I ask you, brothers and sisters, to think not only of the family and friends who were cut down before your very eyes, but to think also of the ones who were abducted─the ones who may yet live!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000440_RAUBAHN<tab>Cependant, je vous en conjure<var 1D /var>! Pensez à ceux que les Impériaux nous ont enlevés<var 1D /var>! Pensez à leurs bien-aimés, à leurs familles, à leurs amis, qui attendent anxieusement leur retour<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000450_RAUBAHN<tab>Where were they taken? What became of them? These questions demand answers!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000450_RAUBAHN<tab>Nous ignorons où notre ennemi a conduit ces otages. Je suis certain que vous comprenez l'importance de trouver une réponse à cette question.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000460_RAUBAHN<tab>I share your thirst for justice. For vengeance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000460_RAUBAHN<tab>J'entends bien vos cris de vengeance et de justice.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000461_RAUBAHN<tab>But we will gain only fleeting satisfaction if we give in to our base appetites─we will never know the truth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000461_RAUBAHN<tab>Je souhaite néanmoins que vous attendiez avant de prononcer une quelconque sentence à l'encontre de cette femme<var 1D /var>! Si nous la tuons maintenant, elle ne pourra plus rien nous apprendre d'utile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000470_RAUBAHN<tab>Now is the time that we, the people of Ala Mhigo, must decide what manner of nation we will build for ourselves, and for generations yet unborn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000470_RAUBAHN<tab>Le peuple d'Ala Mhigo est à l'aube d'une ère de changement. Une nation nouvelle va bientôt naître<var 1D /var>! J'en appelle donc à vous tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000480_RAUBAHN<tab>When they look to our example, will they see a people who held fast to their principles, or one who cast them aside when tried?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000480_RAUBAHN<tab>Laissez à vos futurs dirigeants les moyens de connaître la vérité et de prendre les bonnes décisions<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000490_RAUBAHN<tab>I say to you, it is our responsibility to give these prisoners a fair trial, that they might answer to all of Ala Mhigo! The Garleans called us savages, and I'll be damned if we prove them right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000490_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce sera à eux de juger les criminels et de leur infliger les peines qu'ils méritent<var 1D /var>! Pour l'heure, même si je conçois que c'est difficile, je vous demande de contenir votre rancœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000500_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>I know you're right, I do, but...I can't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000500_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>D'accord, d'accord. Mais je pardonnerai jamais à cette garce...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000510_FORDOLA<tab>Well, well, well... So many visitors. Come to have a good laugh, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000510_FORDOLA<tab>Hmpf, regardez qui voilà. Vous êtes venus m'humilier tous ensemble, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000520_FORDOLA<tab>Or do you mean to put me out of my misery? To finish what you started? It's about bloody time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000520_FORDOLA<tab>À moins que vous ne soyez ici pour écouter ma dernière volonté<var 1D /var>? Tout ce que j'espère, c'est que vous mettrez fin à ma misérable existence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000530_LYSE<tab>That's not why we're here, no.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000530_LYSE<tab>Ni l'un ni l'autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000540_LYSE<tab>Do you remember what I said? How I promised you you'd live long enough to see us win our freedom? Well, I meant it. And not to mock you, either.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000540_LYSE<tab>Comme je te l'ai dit avant, je compte te laisser la vie sauve, mais ce n'est ni pour t'humilier, ni pour savourer ma victoire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000550_FORDOLA<tab>You're wasting your time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000550_FORDOLA<tab>Imbécile.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000560_FORDOLA<tab>All of this is pointless. There's no reason to keep me alive, and you know it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000560_FORDOLA<tab>À quoi bon me garder en vie<var 1D /var>? Je n'ai plus aucune raison d'être<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000570_FORDOLA<tab>I killed your men─I killed my men! And you know what my only regret is? That I didn't kill you when I had the chance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000570_FORDOLA<tab>J'ai fait tuer mes propres camarades. Un sacrifice inutile, parce que j'ai fini par être vaincue... Il ne me reste plus rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000580_ARENVALD<tab>That's a lie, and you know it! You think we can't tell what you're trying to do? That we're blind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000580_ARENVALD<tab>Arrête de t'apitoyer sur ton sort et sois franche, veux-tu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000590_ARENVALD<tab>You're a fool, but you're not stupid. You're ruthless. Relentless. You'd give up anything and everything to get what you want.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000590_ARENVALD<tab>Malgré la cruauté de tes actes, ils n'étaient pas sans raison<var 1D /var>! Si tu as fait tous ces sacrifices, c'était pour que les Mhigois recouvrent leur fierté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000600_ARENVALD<tab>You didn't come this far, climbing over the bodies of your own brothers and sisters, just to piss it all away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000600_ARENVALD<tab>Et il t'a forcément fallu beaucoup de détermination et de courage pour agir ainsi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000601_ARENVALD<tab>I see you, Fordola! I see you for what you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000601_ARENVALD<tab>Je sais de quoi je parle... Oui, je sais tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000610_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Come along, Fordola! We mustn't be late! The imperial viceroy will be attending today's banquet!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000610_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Fordola<var 1D /var>! Allez, viens ou nous allons être en retard pour la réception. Il y aura même le seigneur Gaius.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000620_FORDOLA<tab>All right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000620_FORDOLA<tab>Oui, Maman<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000630_FORDOLA<tab>Father, what's Lord Gaius like? Is he nice? Are you friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000630_FORDOLA<tab>Papa, Papa. C'est qui Gaius<var 1D /var>? S'il te plaît, dis-moi<var 1D /var>! Je veux savoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000640_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>There you go again with all your questions...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000640_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Ha ha ha. Voilà un moment que tu ne m'avais pas bombardé de questions. Je commençais à m'inquiéter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000650_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Lord Gaius is a great and honorable man who looks after all of Ala Mhigo. He's very busy, and if we don't hurry, we'll miss our chance to see him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000650_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Le seigneur Gaius, ma chérie, c'est le gouverneur de notre province, un monsieur très important. Si on ne se dépêche pas, nous allons rater notre chance de le voir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000660_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Filthy tinhead-lovers...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000660_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Hmm<var 1D /var>! Sales traîtres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000670_FORDOLA<tab>Father, what did that man call us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000670_FORDOLA<tab>Papa, papa<var 1D /var>! Ça veut dire quoi “traîtres”<var 1D /var>? Dis-moi, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000680_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>The little tinhead-lover doesn't know what she is, eh? A traitor, sweetheart. A backstabbing bitch who'd gladly betray her kith and kin to gnaw on what few scraps the imperials deign to toss her. Like your bastard father and whore mother!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000680_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Hé hé, tu veux savoir ce que ça veut dire, gamine<var 1D /var>? Des traîtres, c'est des gens comme ton père et ta mère<var 1D /var>: des ordures qui ont vendu leur pays et leurs proches pour avoir la vie facile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000690_FORDOLA<tab>That's not true! My parents are good people! They've never done anything like that!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000690_FORDOLA<tab>C'est pas vrai<var 1D /var>! Mon papa et ma maman, ils sont gentils<var 1D /var>! C'est pas des ordures<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000700_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Oh but they were quick to help themselves and their bitch spawn, weren't they? You're just as guilty as them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000700_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Si tes parents sont si gentils avec toi, c'est parce qu'on doit souffrir à cause d'eux<var 1D /var>! Mais ça, tu peux pas le comprendre, sale morveuse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000710_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Fordola!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000710_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Attention<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000720_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Traitors!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000720_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Traîtres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000730_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Traitors!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000730_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Vendus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENC<tab>Traitors!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENC<tab>Salauds<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000750_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Please! You have to do something! My husband and daughter are in danger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000750_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Soldats<var 1D /var>! Vous devez intervenir<var 1D /var>! Mon mari et ma fille sont en danger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000760_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Soldiers of the imperial army are under no obligation to intervene in the disputes of Aan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000760_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Nous autres Garlemaldais n'avons pas le temps de nous immiscer dans les querelles de vulgaires sauvages.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000770_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>We're citizens! We have rights!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000770_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Comment osez-vous dire cela<var 1D /var>!? Nous avons le statut de citoyen<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000780_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>[GASP OF PAIN]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000780_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Argh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000790_FORDOLA<tab>Father, I'm scared!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000790_FORDOLA<tab>Papa... J'ai peur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000800_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>It's all right, it's all right. They don't understand. But they'll see in time. They'll see that this is the only way to survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000800_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, Fordola... Un jour, ces gens comprendront que ça ne sert à rien de s'opposer à l'Empire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000810_FORDOLA<tab>[SHRILL SCREAM OF TERROR]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000810_FORDOLA<tab>Papa<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000820_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Let the savages have their fun. They'll be more compliant once they've tired themselves out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000820_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Laisse<var 1D /var>! Si ces barbares veulent se battre entre eux, grand bien leur fasse. Mieux vaut ça que de les voir diriger leur agressivité contre nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000830_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Fordola, please! You already have citizenship! Why would you want to become a soldier!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000830_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Fordola<var 1D /var>! Je t'en prie, ne fais pas ça<var 1D /var>! Tu es une citoyenne de l'Empire<var 1D /var>! Tu n'as rien à gagner en t'enrôlant dans l'armée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000840_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Oh gods, what have you done to your face!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000840_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Que fais-tu avec ce tatouage sur le visage<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000850_FORDOLA<tab>Forgotten it already, have you? I'm honoring Father's memory.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000850_FORDOLA<tab>Je me disais bien que tu le reconnaîtrais. C'est le même tatouage traditionnel que portait Papa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000860_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>By telling the world that you're no better than a common savage!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000860_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Si tu te montres avec ce symbole mhigois, les Garlemaldais te traiteront comme une sauvage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000870_FORDOLA<tab>Am I, though, Mother? Are any of us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000870_FORDOLA<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? Ne viens-tu pourtant pas de dire que j'étais une citoyenne de l'Empire, à l'instant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000880_FORDOLA<tab>Can't you see? Citizenship means nothing to them. If you're not a pureblood Garlean, you're no different from any other savage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000880_FORDOLA<tab>Que tu le veuilles ou non, les Garlemaldais ne voient en nous qu'une bande de moins que rien, citoyens ou pas. Ils ne nous considéreront jamais comme leurs égaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000890_FORDOLA<tab>So I'll play the part. I'll join the legion and I'll make them respect me. And when the mob see that, they'll think twice before throwing their stones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000890_FORDOLA<tab>C'est pourquoi j'ai décidé d'entrer dans l'armée et d'obtenir suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment de pouvoir afin de faire taire tous ceux qui me manquent de respect<var 1D /var>! Je ne finirai pas comme mon père<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000900_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin. It's time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000900_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes prêts<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000910_FORDOLA<tab>It'll be hard. Humiliating. They'll try to break us─send us crawling back to our “own kind.” But we won't, no matter what. We'll bleed for them─die for them if we have to. We'll do whatever it takes to be free!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000910_FORDOLA<tab>Nous allons leur montrer qui nous sommes et ferons tout ce qui est nécessaire<var 1D /var>! Nous gravirons les échelons pour recouvrer notre fierté, quel qu'en soit le coût<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000920_ARENVALD<tab>So, you mean to play the part one last time, eh? The unrepentant traitor, whose death will serve to unite the people?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000920_ARENVALD<tab>Tu veux te faire exécuter, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Tu penses sûrement qu'en concentrant toute leur haine sur toi, les gens retrouveront un sentiment d'unité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000930_FORDOLA<tab>Shut up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000930_FORDOLA<tab>Non<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000940_ARENVALD<tab>You had every chance to kill yourself. Fashion a noose from your clothes, wait for the guards to leave you alone long enough to slip it over your neck─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000940_ARENVALD<tab>Si tu voulais simplement en finir, tu serais déjà morte à l'heure qu'il est. Un vêtement ou un drap t'aurait aisément permis de te pendre<var 1D /var>! Je me trompe<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000950_FORDOLA<tab>I said shut up!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000950_FORDOLA<tab>La ferme<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000960_ARENVALD<tab>But then it would all have been for nothing, wouldn't it? Whatever it takes. That's what you said.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000960_ARENVALD<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Je ne me tairai pas, et tu sais pourquoi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000970_FORDOLA<tab>...Been in my head, have you? Had a little peek at my past?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000970_FORDOLA<tab>... Toi et l'autre, vous avez vu mon passé, c'est ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000980_FORDOLA<tab>And what, a few stolen memories tell you everything you need to know, do they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000980_FORDOLA<tab>Ce n'était sûrement qu'un minuscule fragment de ma vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000990_FORDOLA<tab>Don't you dare patronize me! You don't know a godsdamned thing about the life I've led!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000990_FORDOLA<tab>Ne croyez pas tout savoir grâce à ça<var 1D /var>! Vous ne savez rien de moi, RIEN<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001000_FORDOLA<tab>The bastards that killed him, the bastards that let it happen─my father deserved better! I swore I'd do whatever it took to make them pay!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001000_FORDOLA<tab>Tout ce que je voulais, c'était montrer à ceux qui ont tué mon père que je valais mieux qu'eux<var 1D /var>! J'étais prête à tout pour ça<var 1D /var>! Même à acquérir ce maudit pouvoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001010_FORDOLA<tab>Ugh...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001010_FORDOLA<tab>Ghh... Arghh...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001020_FORDOLA<tab>[EXHAUSTED PANTING]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001020_FORDOLA<tab>(souffle)... (souffle)... (souffle)...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001021_FORDOLA<tab>You...y-you... All that power...all that pain... It's too much... Too much for anyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001021_FORDOLA<tab>Et toi, comment arrives-tu... à endurer un supplice pareil... à contenir un tel pouvoir<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001030_FORDOLA<tab>The things they've done to you. The lies, the betrayal, the endless fighting...yet there you stand, unbroken. How...? Why...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001030_FORDOLA<tab>Toutes ces souffrances... ces trahisons... ces sentiments intimes de parfaits inconnus... Comment peux-tu continuer à aller de l'avant en étant exposé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à tout ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You know why. You saw.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tu as <var 1A 02 /var>vu<var 1A 01 /var> pourquoi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>For those I have lost. For those I can yet save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Car ces sentiments m'ont été confiés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Because I choose to.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Je cherche à protéger ce qui m'est cher.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001040_FORDOLA<tab>Damn you... Damn you all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001040_FORDOLA<tab>Raahhh<var 1D /var>! Bordel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001050_LYSE<tab>You still have time, Fordola. Think about how you want to spend it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001050_LYSE<tab>Tu as encore du temps devant toi. Profites-en donc pour bien réfléchir à l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001060_LYSE<tab>Let's go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001060_LYSE<tab>Venez, sortons d'ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I thank you for answering my summons in these most interesting times. You have been busy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous te remercions d'avoir fait le déplacement jusqu'à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The liberation of Ala Mhigo will have far-reaching consequences, and there is a matter upon which I would seek your counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Maintenant qu'Ala Mhigo est libérée du joug garlemaldais, nous souhaitons régler une question et nous avons besoin pour cela de ton avis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I speak of Raubahn, and his future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est au sujet de Raubahn.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>All know the tale of his rise from penniless refugee to member of the Syndicate, and General of the Immortal Flames... Yet though he has come to call Ul'dah home, it will never be his homeland. He is a son of Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Comme tu le sais, il sert fidèlement notre Cité depuis longtemps, mais sa véritable patrie reste Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And now that she is free, I thought it only a matter of time before he sought my leave to return to her. Indeed, I had resigned myself to his loss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous pensions qu'il exprimerait le souhait d'y retourner...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001120_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Suffice it to say, I was...greatly surprised to hear him speak so lightly of handing over the reins in Ala Mhigo, and retaking his place at my side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001120_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pourtant, voilà que Raubahn parle comme d'une évidence de rentrer à Ul'dah une fois la situation stabilisée en Gyr Abania.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I will welcome him with open arms, of course─he is my most trusted advisor...and my dearest friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Il a toujours été pour nous un soutien colossal, un mentor. À tel point que nous serions fort embarrassée s'il venait à nous quitter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001140_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But I have known the man a long time, and beneath that steely gaze, I spied a flicker of doubt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001140_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn et nous avons tissé des liens profonds au fil des années... Tant et si bien que nous savons déceler la moindre hésitation de sa part dans son regard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001150_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Whether Raubahn chooses to remain in Ul'dah or return to Ala Mhigo, I only wish that he do so with a heart unburdened by guilt or regret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001150_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Qu'il décide de rester à Ul'dah ou de retrouver Ala Mhigo, notre unique souhait est qu'il fasse ce choix sans aucun doute ni regret.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001160_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yet how can he freely make such a choice knowing how much I depend on him?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001160_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn refusera d'écouter son cœur tant que nous ne démontrerons pas l'assurance requise pour faire face à nos res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001170_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It is past time that I learned to discharge my duties as a sultana alone. I must go forth and see my realm with my own eyes, and hear the wind with my own ears.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001170_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous devons donc devenir autonome et assumer pleinement notre rôle de sultane. Pour cela, il nous faut nous exposer davantage aux réalités de notre monde afin de mieux le comprendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001180_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Might I have your company for a brief adventure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001180_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Veux-tu bien nous y aider<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001190_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Wonderful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001190_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Merci, nous t'en sommes re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001191_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Allow me a moment to change into something a touch less conspicuous, and I will join you outside.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001191_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous allons nous changer. Nous te rejoindrons dès que nous serons prête.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001192_HIGHLANDERGLADIATOR<tab>[CHARGING BATTLE  CRY]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001192_HIGHLANDERGLADIATOR<tab>Mouôôôh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001193_RAUBAHN<tab>[SWINGING SWORD GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001193_RAUBAHN<tab>Yaaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001194_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[STAGGERING BACKWARDS EXERTION]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001194_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>Eurgh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001195_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[LOUD LOW FRUSTRATED GROWL]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001195_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>Mmmmrrh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001196_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[ROAR OF RAGE]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001196_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>Grrraaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001197_RAUBAHN<tab>[SWINGING SWORD GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001197_RAUBAHN<tab>Raaah<var 1D /var>!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001198_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[HITTING GROUND HARD REAX GRUNT]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001198_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>Gooouuaargh<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001199_RAUBAHN<tab>[EXHAUSTED PANTING]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001199_RAUBAHN<tab>(souffle)... (souffle)...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001201_RAUBAHN<tab>[RELIEVED SIGH]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001201_RAUBAHN<tab>Ha ha...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001200_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Your Grace, you mustn't! The danger is too great!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001200_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Attention, Votre Majesté<var 1D /var>!! C'est dangereux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001210_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Please, Your Grace, come back! I beg of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001210_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Je vous en prie, revenez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It seems you're the one who needs looking after, Marcechamp!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est plutôt toi qui devrais faire attention, Marcechamp<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001221_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001221_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001230_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001230_RAUBAHN<tab>Ma Reine<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001240_RAUBAHN<tab>I have kept the promise made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001240_RAUBAHN<tab>J'ai tenu ma promesse, Votre Majesté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001250_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>So you have. And, in turn, so too shall I keep mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001250_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous sommes très satisfaite. À notre tour de tenir la nôtre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001260_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>With your winnings, you have become one of the six most wealthy souls in all Ul'dah. And so, as tradition dictates, Raubahn Aldynn...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001260_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>La récompense du championnat fait de toi l'un des hommes les plus riches de notre Cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001270_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>...You have earned yourself a seat on the Syndicate! May your new station garner you still greater glories!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001270_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu vas donc devenir membre du Cartel des Scorpions<var 1D /var>! Puisses-tu faire honneur à ta charge et servir notre Cité loyalement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001280_RAUBAHN<tab>I am honored, Your Grace, and vow to serve with every fiber of my being, from this day till my last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001280_RAUBAHN<tab>Ma Reine, ma force et mon savoir vous appartiennent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001290_RAUBAHN<tab>Long live the sultana! And long live Ul'dah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001290_RAUBAHN<tab>Gloire à Sa Majesté, gloire à Ul'dah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001300_LOLORITO<tab>A personal summons from the Scions─this must be important business indeed. Though if it concerns anything so underhand as an assassination, I fear I can be of little help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001300_LOLORITO<tab>Cette affaire doit être très importante pour que les Héritiers me demandent de venir au Refuge des sables. En tout cas, ne pensez pas pouvoir en profiter pour attenter sur ma personne.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001310_LOLORITO<tab>Hm hm hm hm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001310_LOLORITO<tab>Hé hé hé hé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001320_LOLORITO<tab>You have made your point.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001320_LOLORITO<tab>Voilà qui est inattendu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001330_LOLORITO<tab>'Tis indeed unsettling to find oneself seated across from an impassive mask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001330_LOLORITO<tab>Je n'imaginais pas me retrouver en face d'un interlocuteur masqué en venant ici...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001340_LOLORITO<tab>There. Would this better please Your Grace? Or should I address you as “Lady Lilira,” hmm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001340_LOLORITO<tab>Cela vous sied-il mieux ainsi, Votre Majesté<var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>... Ou peut-être serait-il plus convenable que je vous appelle Dame Lilira<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nay, the deception has served its purpose. I am glad to see you found amusement in my little jest, Lord Lolorito, but shall we proceed to the business at hand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Appelez-nous Nanamo. Nous voyons que cette petite mise en scène vous a amusé. Si vous n'y voyez pas d'in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>vé<var 16 /var>nient, nous aimerions entrer directement dans le vif du sujet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001360_LOLORITO<tab>By all means. I must say, I am most eager to hear your proposal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001360_LOLORITO<tab>Je vous en prie, Dame Nanamo. J'ai hâte d'entendre ce que vous avez à me proposer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Simply put, I would aid the refugees camped in Thanalan in their efforts to return to Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est à propos des réfugiés mhigois qui vivent dans le Thanalan. Nous souhaitons les aider à retourner dans leur patrie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The reparations you paid in the wake of your earlier misdemeanors will be used to fund the endeavor─together with the fortune seized from the late Teledji Adeledji's estate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Pour cela, nous comptons utiliser comme fonds publics les intérêts de Teledji Adeledji et la moitié de votre fortune que nous avons reçus en compensation pour l'affaire du banquet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But this plan is not intended to benefit the displaced alone. I would make of this an investment which shall enrich Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Outre sa vocation humanitaire, nous voulons que ce projet puisse également générer des profits pour notre Cité à la hauteur de l'in<var 16 /var>ves<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And who better to consult on matters of profit than the wealthiest man in all of Thanalan? I beseech you, then, Lord Lolorito...share with us your mercantile wisdom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Et qui de mieux placé que le fameux “milliardaire” pour nous aider à réaliser cette idée<var 1D /var>? Êtes-vous prêt à mettre votre expérience et votre influence à notre disposition, Seigneur Lolorito<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001410_LOLORITO<tab>Ah heh heh... 'Twould seem Your Grace has matured beyond acts of earnest yet misplaced charity. Pray tell me more...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001410_LOLORITO<tab>Eh bien, vous avez apparemment beaucoup appris sur les mécanismes de la société, Votre Majesté. Expliquez-moi donc votre projet plus en détail, s'il vous plaît.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001420_LOLORITO<tab>To summarize: in return for facilitating the repatriation of refugees, and assisting in the establishment of new industry in Ala Mhigo, you ask that a proportion of all subsequent profits be promised to Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001420_LOLORITO<tab>Intéressant... Soutenir une activité locale et faire bénéficier aux Uldiens d'une partie des profits en échange de l'aide apportée aux réfugiés mhigois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001430_LOLORITO<tab>I am impressed, Your Grace. 'Tis an elegant solution─albeit one lacking certain crucial details, specifically which industry and where.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001430_LOLORITO<tab>Cela me paraît être une bonne idée sur le papier. Hélas, je crains qu'elle manque cruellement d'aspect concret et pratique en l'état.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>How swiftly you identify the weakness in my plan, just as I knew you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous n'en attendions pas moins du meilleur homme d'affaire de notre cité. Ce que vous dites est juste<var 1D /var>: il nous faut un plan précis et détaillé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001450_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Your travels have taken you across the length and breadth of Gyr Abania, and you know the land far better than I.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001450_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Toi qui as traversé Gyr Abania en long et en large, tu as sûrement vu de nombreux villages là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001460_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Which of the settlements you visited would best provide a home for our refugees? Which has the greatest potential to flourish, given the appropriate investment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001460_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>À ton avis, y en a-t-il un qui pourrait accueillir nos réfugiés et permettre de développer une activité économique<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quel village serait idéal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>La Salaisonnerie

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quel village serait idéal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>La Salaisonnerie

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quel village serait idéal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>La Salaisonnerie

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Quel village serait idéal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>... La Salaisonnerie<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Clearly you want me to say “the Saltery.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Mais c'est bien sûr<var 1D /var>! La Salaisonnerie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001470_LOLORITO<tab>Yes, a quarry town certainly does carry the potential for profit─at least, it would do, were it situated anywhere near a lucrative market. It would cost more to transport the materials than they are worth. In my humble opinion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001470_LOLORITO<tab>Hmm... L'ex<var 16 /var>ploi<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion de la pierre a ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment le potentiel de générer des profits. Mais les coûts de transport qu'elle ne manquera pas d'engendrer la rendent peu attrayante...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001480_LOLORITO<tab>Yes, if a stable trade route can be established between Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo, then Ala Ghiri would once more become an important waypoint. But while such growth would greatly benefit its current residents, I am afraid it could sustain little beyond that...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001480_LOLORITO<tab>Une fois que les échanges entre Ul'dah et Ala Mhigo auront repris, ce village relais jouera assurément un rôle important. Mais les transactions qui y auront lieu suffiront pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment juste à faire vivre les gens qui habitent déjà là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001490_LOLORITO<tab>Ah, yes─that desolate little village on the shore of Loch Seld.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001490_LOLORITO<tab>Voilà qui est intéressant... Bien qu'il soit quasi abandonné, ce village est situé près du lac Seld et dispose en effet d'ins<var 16 /var>tal<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>tions pour le salage des aliments.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001500_LOLORITO<tab>I know the Saltery and its products well. The imperial invasion brought an end to their more widespread distribution, much to the dismay of many a wealthy gourmand. Myself included.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001500_LOLORITO<tab>Par ailleurs, le sel de cette région est réputé pour sa saveur par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re. Nombreux sont les gourmets qui ont grandement regretté que son approvisionnement cesse après l'invasion garlemaldaise, moi le premier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001510_LOLORITO<tab>Salt has ever been a transformative ingredient. And in this instance, I daresay it could transform a modicum of effort into a mountain of gil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001510_LOLORITO<tab>Le sel est un condiment in<var 16 /var>dis<var 16 /var>pen<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble à la cuisine, et puis on peut le travailler de différentes façons pour créer divers produits... Hmm... Oui, j'ai le sentiment que nous tenons ici un bon filon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001520_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The local citizens will need to be consulted, of course, but I trust the East Aldenard Trading Company can be relied upon to provide its assistance in negotiating a mutually beneficial arrangement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001520_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Il va nous falloir convaincre la population locale de coopérer. Êtes-vous prêt à engager votre firme dans cette affaire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001530_LOLORITO<tab>Naturally, Your Grace. I shall dispatch representatives well versed in the extraction of this “white gold,” and wring every last onze of profit from its production.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001530_LOLORITO<tab>Vous pouvez compter sur moi. Je vais veiller à ce que mes employés appliquent tout leur savoir-faire à transformer ces petits cristaux blancs en une véritable fortune.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001540_LOLORITO<tab>The loch's bounty will contribute to Ala Mhigo's enrichment, whilst easing the burden on the Bull's aching shoulders─just as Your Grace desired.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001540_LOLORITO<tab>Comme le souhaite Sa Majesté, ce projet guidera sûrement notre cher “taureau” sur la voie qui est la sienne...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001550_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>A deal is struck, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001550_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Affaire conclue, alors<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001560_RAUBAHN<tab>Apologies for the wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001560_RAUBAHN<tab>Désolé de t'avoir fait attendre, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001570_RAUBAHN<tab>People are screaming for the Butcher's blood again. No sooner have we broken up one mob than another forms. Thankfully, all have been amenable to reason...thus far.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001570_RAUBAHN<tab>Des Mhigois ont à nouveau manifesté leur désir de voir Fordola exécutée, et nous avons une fois de plus dû les convaincre de se disperser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001580_RAUBAHN<tab>But it is no concern of yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001580_RAUBAHN<tab>Enfin bref, je ne vais pas t'ennuyer avec ces histoires.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001590_RAUBAHN<tab>We must speak of the men Arenvald and his comrades apprehended in the Peaks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001590_RAUBAHN<tab>Si je t'ai fait appeler, c'est pour te parler de ces deux hommes qu'Arenvald et ses camarades ont appréhendés dans la région des Pics.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001600_PIPIN<tab>By their uniforms, the captives were first judged to be imperial troops...but after further investigation, their true identities came to light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001600_PIPIN<tab>Nous avions d'abord cru que c'étaient de simples soldats impériaux du fait de leurs uniformes, mais nous avons découvert leurs réelles identités en les interrogeant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001610_PIPIN<tab>I daresay you remember Yuyuhase and Laurentius─the fugitives who conspired with Captain Ilberd in the Crystal Braves' betrayal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001610_PIPIN<tab>Il s'agit de Yuyuhase et de Laurentius. Vous les connaissez forcément puisque ce sont deux anciens membres des Braves du Cristal qui avaient fui avec Ilberd.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001620_PIPIN<tab>Aye, well...it would seem they followed him all the way to the Wall. It was they who orchestrated the slaughter of the Resistance fighters prior to the Griffin's infernal ritual.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001620_PIPIN<tab>Ils nous ont avoué avoir participé au massacre organisé de résistants mhigois afin d'invoquer ce dragon à la Muraille de Baelsar.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001630_RAUBAHN<tab>Were it in your hands, how would you punish these men?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001630_RAUBAHN<tab>Que devrions-nous faire d'eux, à ton avis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Their lives would be forfeit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Il faut leur infliger la peine capitale, rien d'autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Execution is not the answer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Tâchons seulement de leur laisser la vie sauve...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001640_RAUBAHN<tab>Hear, hear. There is no more fitting sentence for the perpetrators of such a massacre. And that is but one of their crimes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001640_RAUBAHN<tab>Ce qu'ils ont fait est en effet ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment grave. Seuls des monstres seraient capables de manipuler et de tuer des gens dont le seul désir est de libérer leur patrie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001650_RAUBAHN<tab>You would spare these animals? Yours is a more merciful brand of justice than mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001650_RAUBAHN<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? Malgré leur trahison et leurs crimes, tu serais prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à leur laisser la vie sauve<var 1D /var>? Je te trouve bien clément<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>In any event, I thank you for your honesty. When the time comes for the Alliance to pass judgment, I'll see that your opinion is heard.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est sûrement à l'Alliance éorzéenne qu'il reviendra de juger ces hommes, et je ne manquerai pas de faire part de ton opinion au moment du procès.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001670_RAUBAHN<tab>Well, that concludes our business here, but there is more I would say. Walk with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001670_RAUBAHN<tab>C'est tout pour cette affaire, mais si ça ne te dérange pas, j'aimerais te parler d'autre chose... Marchons un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>I bear a share of the blame for Ilberd's atrocities. Had I openly supported the cause of Ala Mhigan liberation, he might not have felt driven to do what he did...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>Je me sens responsable pour les actes d'Ilberd. Mon manque de fermeté dans cette histoire a indubitablement contribué à sa folie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001690_RAUBAHN<tab>Things could have been different, and I'm sorry they aren't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001690_RAUBAHN<tab>Je m'en veux tellement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001700_RAUBAHN<tab>But even after all that has happened, my homeland is free. With the Scions and the Alliance at their side, my countrymen have reclaimed what many thought lost forever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001700_RAUBAHN<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, grâce à ton courage, à celui des autres Héritiers, des soldats de l'Alliance et de mes compatriotes, nous avons réussi à libérer Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001710_RAUBAHN<tab>Under her new leadership, I have every confidence that Ala Mhigo will emerge from the shadow of the Empire and rise once more to greatness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001710_RAUBAHN<tab>Nul doute que le gouvernement de transition donnera à ce pays les moyens de se reconstruire sous un nouveau régime.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001720_RAUBAHN<tab>Which means my work here is done. Soon, I will return to Ul'dah, and take my place at the sultana's side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001720_RAUBAHN<tab>Lorsque ce sera fait, je pourrai alors retourner à Ul'dah et continuer de servir dame Nanamo comme avant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001730_PIPIN<tab>Father...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001730_PIPIN<tab>Père...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001740_RAUBAHN<tab>I'll not deny there's a part of me that wants to stay...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001740_RAUBAHN<tab>Loin de moi l'idée de renier la patrie qui m'a vu naître et grandir. J'ai bien sûr envisagé la possibilité de m'installer à nouveau à Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001750_RAUBAHN<tab>The same part that contemplated renouncing my rank and joining you as a wandering sellsword.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001750_RAUBAHN<tab>Pour tout t'avouer, j'ai même rêvé de pouvoir redevenir un simple mercenaire, libre d'aller où bon me semble, et de me battre à tes côtés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001760_RAUBAHN<tab>But I pledged my blade to Nanamo. And I will not betray that oath.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001760_RAUBAHN<tab>Toutefois, j'ai juré à la Sultane de mettre mon épée à son service, et ni mes désirs, ni mes aspirations ne sauraient me faire oublier cette promesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001770_PIPIN<tab>Is this truly what you want, Father?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001770_PIPIN<tab>Père, est-ce vraiment ce que vous souhaitez au plus profond de vous-même<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001780_RAUBAHN<tab>It is. Ever has my sword been hers to command, and ever shall it remain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001780_RAUBAHN<tab>Tout à fait. Mon être et ma lame sont à jamais à la disposition de dame Nanamo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001790_RAUBAHN<tab>Thank you for lending an ear. When all the rest are clamoring for me to stay, I trust you'll send me on my way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001790_RAUBAHN<tab>Je tenais absolument à te faire part de ce sentiment, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001800_LYSE<tab>Thank you all for coming.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001800_LYSE<tab>Je vous remercie tous d'avoir répondu à l'appel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001801_LYSE<tab>I am Lyse Hext, and I speak for the Resistance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001801_LYSE<tab>Je suis Lyse Hext, et je parle au nom de l'armée de libération mhigoise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001810_LYSE<tab>Among you are village elders, refugee leaders; envoys from the Ananta and the Qiqirn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001810_LYSE<tab>Sont réunis ici les chefs des villages, les délégués des réfugiés installés hors de nos frontières, et les chefs de tribus des Anantas et des Qiqirns.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001820_LYSE<tab>You've come from every corner of Gyr Abania to help decide the future of Ala Mhigo. But before that, I want to ask you a question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001820_LYSE<tab>Autrement dit, vous êtes les re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tants des peuples de Gyr Abania. Je désire discuter avec vous de l'avenir de notre patrie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001830_LYSE<tab>What was the first thing you noticed when you came in?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001830_LYSE<tab>Mais avant cela, qu'avez-vous d'abord remarqué en entrant dans cette salle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001831_LYSE<tab>For me, it was that empty throne.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001831_LYSE<tab>Moi, c'est cet objet qui a attiré mon regard en premier...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001840_LYSE<tab>It has no one to sit on it now. No viceroy. No king.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001840_LYSE<tab>C'est sur ce trône que s'asseyait le gouverneur impérial, et avant lui, le tyran qui nous persécutait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001850_LYSE<tab>Would any of you like to take their place?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001850_LYSE<tab>Maintenant qu'il est vacant, est-ce que l'un d'entre vous désire y prendre place<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001860_LYSE<tab>Or should someone else sit there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001860_LYSE<tab>Ou y a-t-il quelqu'un que vous souhaitez y voir installé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001870_LYSE<tab>Then let's sit here, in a circle. As equals. And, I hope, as friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001870_LYSE<tab>Personne<var 1D /var>? Alors je vous propose de nous asseoir en rond ici même. En tant qu'habitants de ces terres, je considère que nous sommes tous égaux et amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Expertly done. Lyse has removed monarchy as a choice early in the game, and positioned them to consider a joint government.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse est clairement sûre d'elle. Elle a tout de suite exclu la possibilité d'une nouvelle monarchie et essaie de proposer un régime républicain ou fédéral.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001890_ALPHINAUD<tab>All things considered, I would say events have got off to a fine start...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001890_ALPHINAUD<tab>Les pourparlers devraient se dérouler bien plus facilement que je le pensais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001900_RAGANFRID<tab>...and that is Ala Gannha's stance on the matter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001900_RAGANFRID<tab>Voilà. C'est tout ce que j'ai à dire au nom des villageois d'Ala Gannha.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001910_LYSE<tab>Thank you, Raganfrid. Another vote in favor. Next, let's hear from Shanti of the Qalyana. Tell us, how do your people feel about the idea of a republic...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001910_LYSE<tab>Merci, Raganfrid. J'aimerais maintenant entendre l'avis de Shanti. Nombreux sont ceux qui désirent un régime républicain, mais quelle est la position des Qalyanas à ce sujet<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001920_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>The Ananta wish only that those who dwell within Gyr Abania devote themssselves to our faith...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001920_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Nous autres Anantas n'avons qu'une requête envers les humains et les autres habitants de Gyr Abania. Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001930_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>You shall all worship Sri Lakshmi!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001930_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>C'est qu'ils se dévouent tous au culte de notre Déesse<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Lady of Bliss! Grace usss once more with your beauteousss visage!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Ô Lakshmi, ô Béatificatrice onirique, viens à moi<var 1D /var>! Ssss...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001950_LYSE<tab>This can't be happening... No crystals were allowed through the door!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001950_LYSE<tab>Comment est-ce possible sans cristaux<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>We can worry about the how of it later! We need to evacuate these people right now, or the primal will make thralls of them all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>On enquêtera là-dessus après<var 1D /var>! Pour le moment il faut évacuer tout le monde<var 1D /var>! Fuyez<var 1D /var>! Vite<var 1D /var>! Vous risquez d'être subjugués par cette Primordiale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001970_ARENVALD<tab>It's up to us!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001970_ARENVALD<tab>Interposons-nous<var 1D /var>! Ça permettra aux autres de s'échapper<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001980_RAUBAHN<tab>Hrrraaaaaagh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001980_RAUBAHN<tab>Meurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001990_RAUBAHN<tab>Godsdammit! The guards were already turned!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001990_RAUBAHN<tab>Je comprends mieux... Les gardes avaient été subjugués<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001991_RAUBAHN<tab>Fools!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001991_RAUBAHN<tab>Raaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002000_LYSE<tab>No you don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002000_LYSE<tab>N'approchez pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002010_RAUBAHN<tab>The Qalyana would see us all enthralled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002010_RAUBAHN<tab>Ils sont prêts à tout pour faire de ces gens des esclaves de Lakshmi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002020_LYSE<tab>Then they're going to be sorely disappointed. We have the Warrior of Light and Arenvald to shield us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002020_LYSE<tab>Notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et Arenvald sont restés en arrière pour affronter la Primordiale, mais à deux, ils ne tiendront pas longtemps<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002030_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, but they can't well defend your guests and attack the primal, can they? We're stuck on the back foot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002030_RAUBAHN<tab>Raah<var 1D /var>! Difficile de se battre efficacement avec toutes ces personnes à protéger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002040_LYSE<tab>Uh... All right. I think I have an idea. Keep these people safe, General! I'll be back as soon as I can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002040_LYSE<tab>Raubahn, j'ai une idée<var 1D /var>! Continuez de retenir nos ennemis ici<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Je vais chercher du renfort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002050_RAUBAHN<tab>Bah! Whatever she's about, she'd best make it quick!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002050_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmpf<var 1D /var>! J'imagine que je n'ai pas d'autre choix...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002060_RAUBAHN<tab>Come, then! Who will be next to die on my steel!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002060_RAUBAHN<tab>Venez tous autant que vous êtes<var 1D /var>! Je ne vous laisserai pas faire de mal à ces gens<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002070_ARENVALD<tab>Damn it all... It's only a matter of time before we miss one...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002070_ARENVALD<tab>Je... je commence à faiblir<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002080_ARENVALD<tab>Her!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002080_ARENVALD<tab>Mais qu'est-ce que tu fais ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002090_FORDOLA<tab>What of it? Do you want to kill this thing or not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002090_FORDOLA<tab>Je suis venue vous aider<var 1D /var>! Dépêchons-nous d'annihiler cette abomination<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002100_ARENVALD<tab>[PANTING WITH EXHAUSTION]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002100_ARENVALD<tab>(souffle)... (souffle)... (souffle)...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002101_ARENVALD<tab>We...we did it! We beat her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002101_ARENVALD<tab>Nous... nous avons réussi<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002110_FORDOLA<tab>...What is this?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002110_FORDOLA<tab>Qu'est-ce que ça veut dire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002120_LYSE<tab>...I'm only going to say this once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002120_LYSE<tab>Je ne le dirai pas deux fois, alors ouvre grand tes oreilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002130_LYSE<tab>The Ananta just summoned their primal in the throne room. My friends are fighting her, but they need help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002130_LYSE<tab>Les Anantas ont invoqué leur Primordiale dans le palais royal. Deux de mes camarades sont en train de l'affronter en ce moment même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002140_LYSE<tab>They need someone with the Echo, and by the gods, I wish I had it. But I don't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002140_LYSE<tab>Fordola, contrairement à moi, tu possèdes un pouvoir qui te permet de faire face à ces entités sans risque d'être subjuguée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002150_LYSE<tab>I told you before that you still had time, but things have changed. I need your answer now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002150_LYSE<tab>La dernière fois, je t'ai dit que tu avais le temps de réfléchir à ton avenir, mais ça n'est plus le cas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002160_LYSE<tab>You can end it like Zenos...or you can fight for Ala Mhigo. Your choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002160_LYSE<tab>Tu dois choisir maintenant<var 1D /var>: soit tu utilises cette épée pour mettre fin à tes jours comme Zenos, soit tu t'en sers pour protéger les gens d'Ala Mhigo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002170_RAGANFRID<tab>Seven hells... It's her...the Butcher!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002170_RAGANFRID<tab>Je te reconnais, toi. Tu es l'Exécutrice... La femme qui commandait les Crânes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002180_FORDOLA<tab>It's done. Take me back to my cell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002180_FORDOLA<tab>Je n'ai plus rien à faire ici. Je retourne dans ma cellule.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002190_RAGANFRID<tab>You are not forgiven.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002190_RAGANFRID<tab>Je...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002200_RAGANFRID<tab>Not you. You I will never forgive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002200_RAGANFRID<tab>Je ne vous pardonnerai jamais, à toi et à tes hommes, ce que vous nous avez fait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002210_RAGANFRID<tab>But I will thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002210_RAGANFRID<tab>Toutefois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002220_RAGANFRID<tab>For standing against a primal and saving us from servitude─you have my thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002220_RAGANFRID<tab>Je te remercie d'être venue en aide à nos libérateurs malgré la menace de cette Primordiale.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002230_RAUBAHN<tab>A fine spot to contemplate the heavens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002230_RAUBAHN<tab>Je me demandais qui était ici. Je suis content de voir que c'est toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>The meeting is over. The envoys have chosen to instate a government modeled on Ishgard's House of Commons─a ruling body of representatives elected by the people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>Les re<var 16 /var>pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>tants gyrabaniens viennent tout juste de rendre leur décision. Une assemblée composée d'élus du peuple, à l'image de celle d'Ishgard, va être créée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002250_RAUBAHN<tab>'Tis a fair decision, and one which signals the end of my part in all this. But I would gaze upon Gyr Abania's stars one last time before I leave...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002250_RAUBAHN<tab>Ma mission à Ala Mhigo touche à sa fin. Je suis venu voir le ciel étoilé de ma patrie une dernière fois avant de rentrer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Forget something?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Eh bien, aurais-tu oublié quelque chose, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace!? I─ There was no word...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>Votre Majesté<var 1D /var>!? Mais... pourquoi êtes-vous ici<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002280_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn Aldynn. You are hereby dismissed as General of the Immortal Flames, and relieved of your seat on the Syndicate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002280_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn, nous avons décidé de te libérer de tes res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés de général des Immortels et de membre du Cartel des Scorpions à compter de ce jour même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>But, Your Grace...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Mais pourtant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002300_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn, I am no longer a child.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002300_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas pour nous... Nous saurons continuer sans toi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002301_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Stay here, in your homeland. Work with your brethren. Rebuild Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002301_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu peux donc rester à Ala Mhigo et aider tes compatriotes dans les défis qui les attendent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002310_RAUBAHN<tab>You desire to stand alone─I understand. But remember what happened...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002310_RAUBAHN<tab>Ne me dites pas que vous comptez prendre seule une décision aussi importante<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Sans même écouter mon avis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002320_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I remember full well the consequences of my naivety! And thus did I consult at length with a most trusted advisor ere I embarked upon this course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002320_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous ne sommes pas aussi imprudente<var 1D /var>! Nous avons demandé conseil à la personne en qui nous avons le plus confiance et nous avons mûrement réfléchi notre décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002330_RAUBAHN<tab>A most trusted advisor!? And what of me? Am I no longer deserving of your confidence?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002330_RAUBAHN<tab>La personne en qui vous avez le plus confiance<var 1D /var>!? Et moi, alors<var 1D /var>? Mon avis compte-t-il si peu à vos yeux<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002340_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>What trust can there be between us when you withhold the truth from me!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002340_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn, comment pourrions-nous te demander ton avis sincère... alors que tu n'oses pas nous révéler ton plus grand souhait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Did you think me oblivious to the anguish in your eyes when you spoke of returning to Ul'dah!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous avons lu le doute dans ton regard, lorsque tu t'es dit prêt à retourner à Ul'dah une fois la situation stabilisée ici. Es-tu naïf au point de croire que nous ne nous apercevrions de rien<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>For years and years, we have trusted one another, yet now you refuse to confess your heart's desire!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>S'il y a quelqu'un qui ne réalise pas à quel point nous nous sommes reposée sur toi, à quel point nous avons écouté tes conseils jusqu'à présent... c'est bien toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002370_RAUBAHN<tab>I swore an oath to you that day on the sands. I pledged my sword─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002370_RAUBAHN<tab>Votre Majesté, vous n'avez pas oublié ce jour où j'ai juré de mettre mon épée à votre service, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And it has served me well. But in Pipin you have forged a new sword, as sharp and deadly as the blade you bequeathed him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Non. Mais tu as toi-même désigné ton successeur en remettant ta précieuse épée à Pipin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I will show you a sultana who can wield every weapon at her disposal─including Lolorito and his Monetarist cronies!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>C'est sur lui désormais, ainsi que sur les monétaristes comme Lolorito, que nous allons compter.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>So follow your heart...please. You are home. You are free.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tu peux donc rester à Ala Mhigo, Raubahn. Car c'est ici, parmi les tiens, qu'est ta place.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002410_RAUBAHN<tab>Nanamo, I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002410_RAUBAHN<tab>Dame Nanamo... Je... je...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002420_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Smile for me, Raubahn. I would have this parting be a joyous one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002420_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nous t'en prions, Raubahn, ne pleure pas. Nous souhaitons prendre congé de toi avec le sourire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Thank you, Your Grace. It has been an honor to serve you and Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Je vous remercie... Cela a été un immense honneur de vous servir toutes ces années, Votre Majesté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tomorrow you will serve Ala Mhigo, and fight for the good of all Eorzea. Am I understood?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>À partir de demain, ce n'est plus au service d'Ul'dah, mais à celui d'Ala Mhigo que tu brandiras ton épée. Tu seras le protecteur d'un plus grand nombre d'Éorzéens.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002450_RAUBAHN<tab>Yes, Your Grace...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002450_RAUBAHN<tab>Très bien... Votre Majesté...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002460_LYSE<tab>Thanks for shielding us from Lakshmi, you two. If you hadn't been there, the rest of us would be worshipping her by now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002460_LYSE<tab>Merci à vous deux de nous avoir protégés de cette Primordiale. Grâce à vous, nous avons pu poursuivre nos discussions et prendre une décision.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002470_ARENVALD<tab>You're kind to include me, Lyse, but we both know who did most of the work. I could scarce keep track of the battle, let alone land a telling blow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002470_ARENVALD<tab>Il n'y a pas de quoi en ce qui me concerne, franchement. C'est à peine si j'ai eu la moindre influence sur le combat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002480_ARENVALD<tab>No shame in admitting it. The Warrior of Light has put far better men than me in the shade.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002480_ARENVALD<tab>En tout cas, je comprends mieux pourquoi on vous appelle <var 08 E905 ((la Guerrière)) ((le Guerrier)) /var> de la Lumière. Vous m'avez im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ahem. Did I mention that I encountered the sultana in the palace? It would seem Her Grace has come to Gyr Abania to oversee the final stages of her relocation project.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>À propos, j'ai croisé dame Nanamo au palais. Si j'ai bien compris, elle est venue ici pour régler les derniers détails de son projet devant permettre aux réfugiés mhigois de réintégrer leur patrie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>She was in search of General Aldynn, and I directed her to the rooftop garden. I do hope he was still there...
