target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comme elle cherchait le général Aldynn, je lui ai dit qu'il se trouvait à la Ménagerie royale...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002510_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Are you in the habit of gossiping about the affairs of royalty, Master Leveilleur?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002510_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>On parle de nous dans notre dos, semble-t-il.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Certainly not, Your Grace! I was merely informing my companions─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dame Nanamo<var 1D /var>!? Euh, non, ce n'est pas ce que vous croyez...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002530_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Be at ease, Alphinaud. 'Twas only a jest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002530_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Ce n'est rien, Alphinaud. Nous ne faisions que te taquiner.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002540_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But I must yield the floor to Raubahn. He has an important announcement to make.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002540_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn, tu devrais annoncer la nouvelle à tout le monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002550_RAUBAHN<tab>[THROAT-CLEARING “ahem”]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002550_RAUBAHN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002551_RAUBAHN<tab>As of yesternight, I have been relieved of my post in the Immortal Flames and the Syndicate both...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002551_RAUBAHN<tab>Aujourd'hui, j'ai été libéré de mes fonctions de général des Immortels et de membre du Cartel des Scorpions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002560_PIPIN<tab>...I shall be assuming my father's duties. And may I say that Tizona has never felt heavier upon my back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002560_PIPIN<tab>C'est à moi que revient l'honneur de reprendre les res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>tés de mon père. L'épée qu'il m'a généreusement transmise me paraît un bien lourd fardeau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002570_RAUBAHN<tab>'Twould seem I am in need of employment. Mayhap one of my old acquaintances can introduce me to a mercenary company or some such...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002570_RAUBAHN<tab>Par conséquent, je suis désormais sans travail. Si Ala Mhigo a besoin d'une fine lame, je suis prêt à offrir mes services.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002580_PIPIN<tab>You may be getting on in years, Father, but you'd struggle to find a band of sellswords who wouldn't snap your hand off─your...remaining hand.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002580_PIPIN<tab>Malgré votre âge, je suis sûr qu'un gladiateur ayant autant brillé que vous dans l'arène n'aura aucun mal à trouver de quoi faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002590_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>[STIFLED GIGGLING]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002590_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002591_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yes, the Bull of Ala Mhigo need not be put out to pasture just yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002591_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Le taureau d'Ala Mhigo sans emploi, on n'entend pas ça tous les jours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002592_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>[UNABLE TO CONTAIN HERSELF, BURSTS INTO LAUGHTER]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002592_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002600_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace has developed a wicked edge to her humor. And you, Pipin, would do well not to laugh when the future may hold the same for you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002600_RAUBAHN<tab>Je trouve que vous avez vraiment mauvais caractère der<var 16 /var>niè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment, Dame Nanamo. Quant à toi, Pipin, tu n'es pas en position de rire, crois-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002610_LYSE<tab>So...does this mean you're staying?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002610_LYSE<tab>Vous êtes donc de retour dans votre patrie, Raubahn<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002620_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye. That seems to be the way of it. I would be glad to aid you in rebuilding our nation. If you'll have me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002620_RAUBAHN<tab>Oui, il semblerait que je n'aie plus ma place à Ul'dah. Si on a besoin de moi, je me ferai un plaisir d'aider à rebâtir Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002630_LYSE<tab>"If,“ he says! Welcome home, Raubahn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002630_LYSE<tab>Mais ce sera avec plaisir, bien sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, that was unexpected...though you seem distinctly unsurprised.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Voici une nouvelle pour le moins inattendue, mais à voir votre réaction, je devine que vous étiez déjà au courant, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Either you are more astute than I give you credit for...or I am losing my touch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>J'ai l'impression d'avoir été un peu trompé, moi aussi, mais c'est de bonne guerre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>In any event, one thing is certain: Ala Mhigo will rejoice at the homecoming of her dearest son.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>En tout cas, ceci augure bien pour l'avenir d'Ala Mhigo.
